page.title: 12RECREATION AROUND SCHOOL - 2
page.content: The main hall of the complex provides space for keep fit, circuit training , gymnastics, judo, badminton, volley- ball, netball, indoor hockey, tennis and football. Table tennis tables are located on the main gallery. Outside pitches for cricket, rugby, football, hockey and athletics are also provided. The facilities are shared with the school but they are open for public use every evening and during the weekends. There are large areas of common land included in this block. They are as follows:- Wareham Common - The River Piddle or Trent runs right through the middle of Trigon Farm and Wareham Common. This provides the children with a good swimming and water play area during the summer.
